question: What patterns can be observed in the LinkedIn activity of leaders at companies that have ramped up their hiring for data analytics positions?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have ramped up hiring for data analytics positions. [CompanyHiringDetail]
Gather LinkedIn activity data of leaders at these companies. [PersonaLinkedinActivity, CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
